title: A Modern-Day Manga Artist In The Old Capital
alternative_title: ﾏﾝｶﾞ家修羅譚～平安京をﾍﾟﾝ1本で攻略する方法
status: ﾏﾝｶﾞ家修羅譚～平安京をﾍﾟﾝ1本で攻略する方法
description:
Description :
        A modern-day mangaka fell through time into Heian-era Kyoto...!? All I have left is my will to draw! I'll survive in this world of conflict with a single pen...!
